website_summaries.verdict: While local storage fans will like Oplink's "Cloud-free" approach, its comparatively low-resolution cameras and high monthly fees make it tough to recommend.
pros: You can add a bunch of Oplink accessories to this two-camera kit a la carte
A 16GB flash drive comes with the system for hassle-free local storage
cons: The camera specs aren't competitive with what's available today and you have to pay $20 per month to view saved clips on your phone

customer_reviews.title: Don't be tricked!
customer_reviews.text: The description tells you the Oplink is free to connect to the cloud to review videos, but after three weeks of use, you cannot review your videos unless you sign up for a monthly prescription! Dont buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Crismon

customer_reviews.title: SUCKS
customer_reviews.text: I got the two extra cameras since I am going on vacation in a few days They are plugged in but only the top l ight lights up. Basically they dont work. Any ideas. going to be a hassle to return them.
customer_reviews.author: emd

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Oplink is a great user monitored system, we have 1 camera currently, planning to get more. Good quality for the price, does what i need it to do
customer_reviews.author: SMCairns

customer_reviews.title: Security camera addition
customer_reviews.text: I like that this camera was easy to install and worked with the oplink system I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for those who want a DIY alarm system
customer_reviews.text: Does it exactly what is says and pleased with this product, perfect for those if you choose not want to pay for monitoring. I did have an issue not from the product but I didn't read correctly and called customer service which was friendly and prompt.
customer_reviews.author: DMR

customer_reviews.title: Works good. No problems with the camera and motion functioning ...
customer_reviews.text: Works good. No problems with the camera and motion functioning portion of this device. I am able to view the videos on my IPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Ricki

customer_reviews.title: Great security camera
customer_reviews.text: Great camera for Oplink security system.....we now have 4. Indoors only.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought a second one because I was so pleased with the first
customer_reviews.author: microsoftfree

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera for a great system!
customer_reviews.text: This camera was very easy to add to the Oplink system, and works great! Overall I am happy with the system.
customer_reviews.author: chris goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Yes I like it. It 's more security for my home
customer_reviews.text: Yes I like it. It 's more security for my home.I recommend to buy it
customer_reviews.author: Bay V. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Not a stand alone
customer_reviews.text: It is not stand alone - I gave to my son as a Christmas gift & he wants to return but having some trouble - can you assist me?
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

product_meta.title: Oplink Connected IPC1200 Wi-Fi IP Camera (White)
product_meta.description: A smart wireless camera with motion detection and night-vision streams real-time video and collaborates with other Oplink devices on your network to automatically record triggered events SPECIFICATIONS Wi-Fi and Security IEEE 802 11 b/n/g with WAP/WPA2 PSK Video Quality 640x480 Image Frame Rate up to 30fps Viewing Angle up to 66° Power Adapter Input AC 100-240V Output DC 5V 1A Wi-Fi Range 300 feet (90m) line of sight Operating Temperature 32°F to 113°F (0°C to 45°C)
feature_bullets: This is an add-on device for your uplink security system You must have an uplink security system to use this product
Monitor your home or office From your smartphone
Plug and play installation - no configuration!
